you if this laptop asks for something that has been seen recently somebody else has asked for in recent hours
that's going to come out of the cash and so all the popular names tend get cached everywhere and then the unpopular stuff
the rarely looked up stuff goes up further that's where the recursive server has what we call a cache miss and
